description: Kim Davis, the clerk of Rowan County, Ky., turned away David Ermold and David Moore, who were seeking a marriage license. Ms. Davis said she was acting “under God’s authority.”
title: Same-Sex Couple Confronts Kentucky Clerk
title_page: Same-Sex Couple Confronts Kentucky Clerk - Video - NYTimes.com
text: Kim Davis, the clerk of Rowan County, Ky., turned away David Ermold and David Moore, who were seeking a marriage license. Ms. Davis said she was acting “under God’s authority.”
